#summary Summary of project

= Introduction =

This project provides a collection of utilities for talking to [http://www.microchip.com Microchip] !PicKit ICD programming devices from python.

It also has interface code supporting SPI Flash devices, [http://www.csr.com Cambridge Silicon Radio] Bluetooth devices, and [http://www.emc.com.tw Elantech] EKT8210 touchpads.

It requires the [http://pyusb.berlios.de/ pyusb] and [http://pyserial.wiki.sourceforge.net/pySerial pyserial] libraries.

Currently only the [http://www.microchip.com/stellent/idcplg?IdcService=SS_GET_PAGE&nodeId=1406&dDocName=en023805 PicKit2] is supported.


= Details =

The directory structure is as follows:

<table>
<tr><td>*/*</td><td>[CommandLineApps Command line programs.]</td></tr>
<tr><td>*/pickit*</td><td>[PicKit Interface code to the PicKit itself.]</td></tr>
<tr><td>*/pickit/csr*</td><td>[PicKit_Csr Cambridge Silicon Radio Bluetooth chips support.]</td></tr>
<tr><td>*/pickit/elantech*</td><td>[PicKit_Elantech Elantech Touchpad support.]</td></tr>
<tr><td>*/pickit/spiflash*</td><td>[PicKit_SpiFlash SPI Flash chip support.]</td></tr>
<tr><td>*/pickit/utils*</td><td>[PicKit_Utils Support utilities.]</td></tr>
</table>
